description: Sample Dashboard for KafkaJS Prometheus Exporter

panels.description: Number of active connections
panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description: The total number of connections established with a broker.
panels.title: Created Connections Rate

panels.description: The total number of requests sent.
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: Average request size per request in bytes.

targets.expr: sum(kafka_admin_request_size_total{client_id=~"$admin_client_id", broker=~"$admin_broker"}) by (client_id, broker)/ sum(kafka_admin_request_total{client_id=~"$admin_client_id", broker=~"$admin_broker"}) by (client_id, broker)

panels.title: Average Request Size Per Request

panels.description: The size of the request queue.

targets.expr: sum(kafka_producer_request_size_total{client_id=~"$producer_client_id", broker=~"$producer_broker"}) by (client_id, broker)/ sum(kafka_producer_request_total{client_id=~"$producer_client_id", broker=~"$producer_broker"}) by (client_id, broker)

panels.description: Average Batch Latency.

targets.expr: sum(kafka_consumer_batch_latency_sum{client_id=~"$consumer_client_id", topic=~"$consumer_topic"}) by (client_id, topic) / sum(kafka_consumer_batch_latency_count{client_id=~"$consumer_client_id", topic=~"$consumer_topic"}) by (client_id, topic)

panels.title: Average Batch Latency By Topic

panels.description: Average batch size by topic in bytes.

targets.expr: sum(kafka_consumer_batch_size_total{client_id=~"$consumer_client_id", topic=~"$consumer_topic"}) by (client_id, topic) / sum(kafka_consumer_batch_latency_count{client_id=~"$consumer_client_id", topic=~"$consumer_topic"}) by (client_id, topic)

panels.title: Average Batch Size Per Batch
